text: Falao nkumwing'a Yusufu lina lya Chimisili, Safenasi-Panea.41:45 Safenasi-Panea, ìnahululika kuva na mana la “Nnungu ànatangola.” Uchocho, nkumwing'a Yusufu mwali wanga Potifela, uvanchema Asenasi uchinga ààve n'jawe. Potifela ávele kuhani wa milungu yao wa imanga ya Oni. Bahi Yusufu nkutandilika kuongela chilambo chammalele cha ku Misili.
